short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View details of Ethereum addresses and ENS names, including associated NFTs, transactions, balance (in Ether and USD), and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web3 Hovercards offers a seamless way to access relevant information by displaying a non-intrusive popup modal when hovering over Ethereum addresses and ENS names.

FEATURES:
ðŸ”Ž Highlight Ethereum addresses and ENS names on any webpage when you hover over them.
ðŸ”— matically extract Ethereum addresses from URLs to improve discovery.
ðŸ“Œ View important details such as balance (in Ether and USD), NFTs, and transaction count.

PRIVACY AND TRANSPARENCY:
We prioritize your privacy and maintain transparency. Our extension and the API it uses do not track your browsing activity. Plus, our code is open-source on GitHub, allowing you to review our implementation.
